attributes.title: BOMBARDED BY RACIAL SLURS AND HARMFUL STEREOTYPES
attributes.review: I opened this app to find that, to my horror, this app was created as a way to manipulate the public by way of political propaganda, perpetuating vicious stereotypes and hurling all kinds of racial slurs at its users. Apple needs to do something about this NOW, before things get further out of hand!!!!
